## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description               | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `header` | `header`  | The accordion item header | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `open`   | `open`    | Is the item open          | `boolean` | `false`     |
